description:
Unleash mayhem on each other in your new virtual home where you are allowed to trash every single room without any guilt!

Choose your own playstyle and fight offensively or defensively. It's entirely up to you! Use the environment to your advantage, trap your opponents or just get rid of them in the old-fashioned way. Don’t forget to be mindful of your surroundings as the world around you can sabotage your victory faster than your opponent might!

Challenge your friends in a deathmatch where only the last man standing can prove their win! Or outsmart the enemy team in capture the flag game mode. Choice is yours!

Fight with over 20 unique items each with two unique ways to defeat your opponents! The more you play the more items and levels you unlock so there is never a shortage of fun!

Infinite replayability ensures you won’t ever get bored again! Just grab your friend and hop into the game!

Explore vivid and extremely dangerous rooms and get ready to squabble in a local multiplayer game for 2 - 4 players that shouldn’t be missing at your next house party!
name: Squabble
